Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.common

A collection of common classes used throughout the Spellsource code base. A home for code that has no clear home.

GameState contains a snapshot of all the data in a GameContext.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionListener
    Represents a handler that should listen for game requests.
    Client
    An interface that specifies the boundary between a GameContext and a networking channel like a websocket or a plain TCP socket.
    GameEventListener
    An interface specifying server-to-client data updates.
    HasElapsableTurns
    Indicates that this behvaiour can process elapsed turns
    Server
    An interface that specifies a server instance that's capable of processing Client actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameplayRequest
    Indicates a kind of request for the client.
    GameState
    The fields that correspond to a complete state of the game.
    UnityClientBehaviour
    Represents a behaviour that converts requests from ActionListener and game event updates from EventListener into messages on a ReadStream and WriteStream, decoding the read buffers as ClientToServerMessage and encoding the sent buffers with ServerToClientMessage.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameplayRequestType
    Represents the kind of gameplay request a client can take.
